title: Skin Ideas

replies.body: Let me explain something to you. Some of your ideas are good, BUT Riot do not copy and really take inspiration from thing such as original characters. This is due to the fact that they want all their stuff to be original. E.g. Your Kat skin and Cait skin.
That was added for a friend who has an obsession with that anime. BTW Super Galaxy skin set is from Guran Laggan, an anime..

> [{quoted}](name=Catspeare,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=AdAMm1nk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-07T06:45:52.070+0000)
>
> That was added for a friend who has an obsession with that anime. BTW Super Galaxy skin set is from Guran Laggan, an anime..

it isn't from it, it's inspired by it
